text: The 2019 FIFA Puskás Award was the eleventh FIFA Puskás Award. It was awarded on September 23, 2019, during the The Best FIFA Football Awards 2019 at the Teatro alla Scala in Milan, Italy. Debrecen player Dániel Zsóri was the winner of the award, for his goal against Ferencváros during the 2018–19 Nemzeti Bajnokság I season. For the first time since 2011, the vote percentages were not made public. title: 2019 FIFA Puskás Award
